title: Game Breaking Bug
body: I have enough worlds tokens, i have the worlds pass, i have already bought the zed gold chroma and now i want to buy the kha zix one but it wont show up or let me buy it wtf is going on........

replies.body:
https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce

>We are aware of issues resulting in purchases not being received and are currently investigating.

No timeline on a fix yet.
